titles.title: Countering Chinese Threats to U.S. National Security in Africa Act
Countering Chinese Threats to U.S. National Security in Africa Act
To require a briefing from a senior official of the Department of Defense on actions by the People's Republic of China in Africa that pose a threat to United States national security.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
